name: Time for CUBES
description:
Thanks for playing my game! I hope you liked it!

I would really appreciate any feedback!

CONTROLS

WASD - move

E - pick up

Q - throw / drop weapon

Ctrl - crouch / slide

Left Mouse Button - shoot

R - reload

DESCRIPTION

There is more and more CUBES that are trying to kill you! Find your weapon and defend yourself for as long as you can!

FEATURES

- Top 5 leaderboard 

- 5 weapons to find

- Satisfying reload animation

- 2 secret messages

- A lot of CUBES

CREDITS

Gun shots sfx: https://www.videvo.net/royalty-free-sound-effects/gunshot/

Music by Count Mode: https://www.youtube.com/c/CountMode
